name: Food defense
description:
This game was developed for the GMTK 2021 game jam with the theme Joined together.In this game You are a pair of apple and carrot joined togehter to defend the castle from evil fast food.This is a physics based action tower defense game where in order to defeat the fast feed you should try to make them hit each other or objects around!

Rating the game is appreciated !

TUTORIAL:

use WASD or arrow keys to change the direction of movement.

collect gold and use it to deploy rocks using "1" on keyboard to damage enemies.

use 30 coins to deploy ROCK to make enemies hit the wall or another enemy to die

QUIT using alt+f4 (sorry about this).
